abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by cabaret singer Christine Andreas at Feinstein’s at 54 Below.

headline.print_headline: A Nightclub Era Relived, Via Gershwin and More
headline.main: Review: Christine Andreas’s Nostalgic Turn in ‘Cafe Society’

snippet: Ms. Andreas looks back at tales of fabled clubs and performers in her cabaret show at Feinstein’s at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Andreas looks back at tales of fabled clubs and performers in her cabaret show at Feinstein’s at 54 Below.
